directions: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, combine diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, water and onion.  Bring to a boil, then stir in cooked chicken, beans, broccoli, carrots, salt, pepper, Cajun seasoning and garlic powder.  Let boil 5 minutes, then reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes more.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless chicken breast halves, cooked and cubed
1 (16.5 ounce) can red beans, drained and rinsed
title: Hobart's Chicken and Red Bean Soup
